constructor.details: _maxDurationSeconds can be set to 0 to have no maximum time limit

params.collection: The address to set the deadline for
params.offsetSeconds: a duration in seconds that will be used to set the time limit

returns._0: false if there is no time limit set for that collection

setTimeLimit(address,uint256).notice: Sets the deadline for the given collectionOnly the owner of the collection can set the deadline

timeLimits(address).notice: the time limits expressed as a timestamp in seconds
